name: C.L.E.M.
description:
On an unknown place, far away from the eyes of the society, it exists a laboratory where it conducts evaluations and testing for the unknown. Especially, with creatures outside of our knowledge. The employees calls this laboratory, "C.L.E.M."

One day, something happened: A creature escaped from his cell. 

Codename "2871"...

…in its cell there is something marked... "Malo"...

This was the beginning of an story.

C.L.E.M. is an 2D top-down action-adventure game focused on stealth mechanics. You control the creature called Malo, who is trying to escape the facility.

This game was made in 2015 for Ludum Dare 33, with the theme "You are the monster". Like the other LD games I made before, the old LD website disappear along the games (unless you search well). So I decided to upload those games here on Itch.io.

I hope you like the game :)

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Enter: Begin/Restart Level
